extendedInfo.description: Keep track of your expenses and stay productive on the go. Large and small businesses can easily track business travel and manage expense reports anytime â from anywhere â with Concur.*This app is a companion to Concurâs solutions for existing users*Extend the benefits of Concur's business travel and expense reporting solution to your Android while you're on the go! Simply download now and create your mobile PIN to enjoy all the functionality associated with the Concur solution you already use.With Concur's mobile app, say goodbye to shuffling paper receipts. No more struggling to remember how much you paid in cab fare. Now, all of your receipts and expense charges are gathered and ready for an expense report when you get home.Manage and track business expenses and receipts  *Photograph receipts and edit expenses in Airplane mode  *Import data from credit cards  *Keep track of receipts using our Receipt Store  *Approve expense reports  *Submit expense reports  *Itemize hotel charges  *Add event and meeting attendees  *Approve Travel RequestsManage and track business travel  *Book airfare, hotels and more  *Manage flight, hotel and dining itineraries  *Check flight status  *Integrate with TripIt and TripIt ProLearn more at www.concur.com. Must be an existing Concur Small Business edition, Concur Standard edition, Concur Professional edition, or Concur Premium edition user and create a mobile PIN to access the application.

reviews.title: Very intuitive.... Nearly flawless.
reviews.comment: Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: oscar rivas

reviews.title: Best Android expense tracking
reviews.comment: Brilliant application making it easy and efficient to track the expenses on the go while traveling enabling the report to be submitted as soon as you return
reviews.author: Evan Hochstein

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Very slow to load, makes me log in even though I have auto login turned on and crashes every time I try to look at an existing expense.
reviews.author: Paul Hardy

reviews.title: Best invention since sliced bread!
reviews.comment: Makes the ugliest, most hated aspect of modern business (expense reports) almost enjoyable!
reviews.author: Bernal Rodriguez

reviews.title: Intermittent function
reviews.comment: I like the app, but it screws up occasionally.
reviews.author: Michael Stevens

reviews.title: G
reviews.comment: Works great. No need to worry about lost receipts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Makes entering expenses easier
reviews.comment: Update to my previous review:  They seem to have resolved the issue re. entering multiple expenses so it\'s much more functional now and definitely makes entering expenses easier.     The app still sporadically fails to save expenses and you have to kill the app and start it up again to make it work.  Overall, pretty good.
reviews.author: Brian Dehn

reviews.title: Pretty useless
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing when trying to add a receipt. Kind of the point for this app. Therefore useless.
reviews.author: Tammo Heeren

reviews.title: This made expense reports easy!
reviews.comment: I just used this app and wow! Made it so easy and less time consuming to enter expenses...plus I don\'t need my laptop, but can do this on the fly from anywhere!
reviews.author: Angela Allen

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Works very well and facilitates expense reporting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: The last update doesn\'t allow me to pull individual expenses into a report so I can submit it for approval. It is offering to DELETE only.
reviews.author: netty chow

reviews.title: Great app for expenses
reviews.comment: So easy to use. No more keeping track of receipts. Enter an expense right away, attach receipt, and at the end of the month submit your report. Easy!
reviews.author: Christine Gagne

reviews.title: Latest \'downgrade\' makes the app largely useless
reviews.comment: Used to be good, but with the latest version, I\'m consistently getting errors in saving entries (only after filling in all data) and reciept pictures. Hope they fix the previously non-existent problems soon. Latest problems make the app largely unusable.
reviews.author: Michael Kellogg

reviews.title: Better than the Web interface
reviews.comment: I only do my expenses on my phone. Fast, easy, and simple to use. The best thing that has happened to my company app-wise!
reviews.author: Wren Glitterdust

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Application is well designed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Easy to use, fast to submit expenses
reviews.author: klung am

reviews.title: Very useful app!
reviews.comment: Quick and easy on the go.  Had some issues with screens freezing initially,  but have not had that issue recently,  so think an update had sorted. User it all the time!
reviews.author: Charmaine Swanevelder

reviews.title: Latest version has too many bugs
reviews.comment: After a few expenses I get an error trying to save the receipt image.  Nothing works after this unless I uninstall and reinstall the app.  After this it will work for a few more receipts and close down again.  Been using this app for a year now and had no issues until the lastest update.
reviews.author: Mark Nikirk

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: Easy to track expenses an even submit reports from the road.  Adding receipts with the camera saves time.
reviews.author: Laurie Shedrick

reviews.title: Ugh.
reviews.comment: Bulky and frustrating, especially when concur kicks back an expense for being less than what it thinks it should be.
reviews.author: John Yossarian
